subject: 2 hour interview with our very own researcher Steve Hultay
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Tonight I was joined by our very own Steve Hultay on my Ghost to Ghost 
PM radio show.  Listen to this interesting and informative show at 
http://www.ghosttoghostpm.com

Or use these links for the 3 most recent shows.

2 hour interview with Steve Hultay:
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/ufogeek/blog/2008/01/16/Ghost-to-Ghost-PM

2 hour interview with Bruce Halliday:
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/ufogeek/blog/2008/01/12/Ghost-to-Ghost-PM

Ghost Box demos show:
http://www.blogtalkradio.com/ufogeek/blog/2007/12/29/Ghost-to-Ghost-PM-
Ghost-Story-Friday

- Mike
